name: CastleSmith
description:
Hey, you remember when you used to play with blocks and build structures with them? You haven't done that in a while. Well that's about to change. Take a step back into your childhood with a face-to-face castle environment. Experience a first person view of the things you only dreamed about when you build castles and defeat enemies. "How can I do this?" you may ask. It all takes the click of a button.

This game is action-packed with the ability to use a build and play mode. Take the time to build an elegant and strong castle, then switch to attacking the enemy structures.

Controls:

-Shake VR controllers to run (Like running in place)

-Press the big red button to switch from build to play mode

-Grab items with grip button

-Grab Items to move them (while in build mode)

-Grab the cannon with grip button and pull the right trigger to fire
